name: Manik Segara Villas & Restaurant
address: Kalisada, Seririt, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81153, Indonesia
review 1:
The staff has been nothing but nice and friendly to my husband and I. They were also very accommodating to us both being vegan and the food was delicious!
The room is nice and the views are amazing.
Our stay has been extremely relaxing and perfect for a honeymoon! The only downfall was the 3 1/2 hour drive here from the airport.
review 2: We have been here for breakfast and dinner. It is a beautifull location with rooms and restaurant. We only have been in the restaurant. It is outside next to an very nice infinity pool. The breakfast is goed and the a la carte menu fanstastic. I had pork ribs with vegtebals. Prices is about 100.000 rp average per couvert.
review 3:
Dream stay. The villa is even better than what we expected from the pictures. Beautiful, modern and renovated. Far from everything, such a quiet and relaxing place. The view on the lagoon and ocean is stunning. Perfect cleaning and excellent service. The Manik Villas staff is kind and lovely, they will make your stay even better. Room service is top
quality and food is great. We just
got everything we needed. Highly recommended. Thank you üôèüèº
review 4: Super villa with great service, good restaurants and amazing staff! We enjoyed our 7 days stay here. The place is nice, quite with nature around. The cleaning is every 2 days. You may see sunrises and sunsets, rent a bike, take a dolphin trip, massage, order food in room. The personal is so nice and they help us with everything we need. Thank you!
review 5:
We (couple) stayed here for three nights in a villa with ricefield view. It was just perfect! The villa was even more beautiful than on the pictures, it was so spacious and clean. The food in the restaurant is good and fresh; we especially liked the breakfast with fresh fruit and juice.
Staff is very friendly and helpful with everything. Also we felt very safe here; it‚Äôs really quiet and peaceful at Manik Segera. We would love to come back :-).
